sentences.sCn: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.sContent: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.sCn: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.sContent: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.sCn: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

sentences.sContent: ...Changjiang flows through a wide range of ecology systems...
...This may not be surprising given that this is the age range when women have children...
...It's also the age range when many women are trying to balance careers and home...
...the agency says projections of the number of unemployed people this year range from 210 million to nearly 240 million people...
...The idea is that by having a greater range of things on the menu...
...a limited driving range and very few recharging points...
...perhaps limiting the range of jobs that offer realistic choices...
...Activities can range from running a school health fair to planting a garden...
...I needed to present the full range of duties...
...Trading generates a wide range of emotions second by second...

exam.question: The price of beer _______ from 50 cents to ＄4 per liter during the summer season.

answer.explain: range from... to...：  在从…到…的范围内。句意：  夏季， 每升啤酒的价格从50美分到4美元不等。alter：  更改， 改变； separate from：  将…分开， 隔离； differ from：  与…相异， 有差别； 与…发生分歧。

synos.tran: 平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到
漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动

phrases.pCn: 大范围的；许多各种不同的
全音域，全频；全距；全馏程
产品范围；产品系列；产品类别

words.tran: 又高又瘦的；适于远行的；宽广的
突击队员；漫游者；骑警；别动队员

trans.tranOther: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between
